parameter.name: objective
parameter.description: The position onto which the agent needs to deploy. If no objective is issued, the agent deploys on its own position.

link.name: moveToward
link.description: To enact the decision of moving toward the given position.

link.name: dismount
link.description: To enact the decision of dismounting upon reaching the deployment position.

link.name: activateLogisticChains
link.description: To enact the decision of activating logistic chains upon reaching the deployment position.

feedback.name: logisticChainsActivated
feedback.description: Sent once the agent has activated its logistic chains.

feedback.name: done
feedback.description: Sent once the agent has activated its logistic chains.
